item.title: Brian Ninde & Jimmy Delssantos: Why Western Christian Evangelism Needs To Change! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Brian Ninde & Jimmy Delossantos. Brian and Jimmy are hosts of the Hearts for the Lost Podcast and street evangelists.  They discussed Church vs. Entertainment, the pitfalls of evangelism in the evangelical church as well as the reformed and calvinistic churches, as well as tips on street evangelism, who the church is meant for, and other fun stuff. Enjoy! 

 

K&K Furnishings: Providing quality furnishings for business, education, worship, and hospitality for the Glory of God!

Jacob's Supply: Quality building materials at wholesale prices!

item.title: Ep. 83: The War on Language – How to Discern the Truth [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Words are a powerful tool that can inspire, but they can also be twisted and taken out of context. In a recent speech, former president Donald Trump stated that if he did not win the 2024 presidential election, there would be a “bloodbath”. He did not mean a physical bloodbath, but an economic one. This did not stop every large news outlet in the country from headlining his supposed endorsement of violence. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by The Washington Stand’s Ben Johnson for a discussion about the war on language and how to discern the truth from the lies. We must continue to speak the truth no matter the cost.

Resources 

  • A ‘Bloodbath’ of Journalistic Ethics

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. Published by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Family Research Council⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠.

item.title: TCND: Talk it Out, Use Your Words (March Madness) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
It's basketball season, Neighbor, and our NCAA bracket is looking sad!  But legend has it, the Branyan kids once predicted all four of the Final Four teams and won enough money for John to retire for about two hours. 

Also, there is DRAMA among the McKinney/West/Farkas cousins.  (No, nothing scandalous.) A group of actors, aged 13 and under, are producing their own musical theater show. It's the most adorable thing we've seen in a while.

Next: If a person can't explain WHY the believe something, do they really even believe it?

Use your words, Pkarlgh!   Pictures aren't really worth 1000 words, and you CAN'T preach the Gospel silently...

Contact the Comedian's family by emailing nextdoor@johnbranyan.com

item.title: Immodesty and the Image of God [The Pugcast]
item.description:
As new forms of immodesty become fashionable and impact our everyday wolds in innumerable ways, dimensions of what is broken in us often remain what is 'hidden' or ignored. Tom and the guys engage this topic, especially from the insight that as image bearers we are imitative by nature, and when this is broken in us, we imitate badly, and also want to be imitated in our broken image.

 

Support the Pugcast in Oxford on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-pugcast-goes-to-oxford/x/6893861#/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Thinking Through “Practical Christian Politics” with Kuyper [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: In a speech given in 1891 to open the First Christian Social Congress, Abraham Kuyper nailed the problem Europe was experiencing and that America is now experiencing. His precise definition of the problem and concise explanation of it will help us evaluate whether the “practical politics” practiced by evangelical legal and policy organizations is exposes the absence of something vital to Christianity and culture.

item.title: Ep. 82: The Illusion of the Gold Coast – Where is California Headed? [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
The Gold Coast is slowly losing its shine. It is being dulled by anti-family policies, sky-high living prices, and progressive agendas. How long until it completely tarnishes? Host Joseph Backholm is joined by the president of California Family Council, Jonathan Keller, for a discussion on the current and future state of California. A long-time resident of California, Jonathan offers a unique perspective on his state’s political history, how he has seen the economic landscape change, where it is all headed, and why those outside of California should care. He weighs in on and warns parents of current government initiatives such as Rainbow (Unicorn) Homes, abortion benevolence funds, and the push to limit parental rights. Join Jonathan and Joseph as they remove the rose-colored glasses through which many often view California.

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. item.title: Canada's CORRUPT Elites HATE You! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 14, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dive deep into two MASSIVE SCANDALS -Winnipeg Lab Leak & ArriveCan APP- both of which implicate the Trudeau Regime of massive corruption and incompetence, both of which they are trying to cover up. TUNE IN TO HEAR WHAT THE TRUDEAU-FUNDED MSM WON'T TELL YOU.

[Segment 1] - The Scientist - The Winnipeg Virologist Connected to Carona Virus Gain-of-Function and Lab Leak:
Lab Leak Story by Shiela Gunn Reid | Rebel News Online: https://twitter.com/RebelNewsOnline/status/1767346546763547100;
Winnipeg lab firing documents released | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/winnipeg-lab-firing-documents-released-china-1.7128865;

[Segment 2] - The Cover-up:
Trudeau govt virologists who transferred Ebola to Wuhan had clandestine relationship with Chinese | Zero Hedge: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/trudeau-govt-virologists-who-transferred-ebola-wuhan-had-clandestine-relationship-chinese;
Liberals, NDP shut down committee probing fired scientists | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/liberals-ndp-shut-down-committee-probing-fired-scientists?taid=65e6487672a63d00014ba003;
Liberals, NDP shut down investigation into Winnipeg lab | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/03/04/liberals-ndp-shut-investigation-winnipeg-lab2;

[Segment 3] - ArriveSCAM:
Auditor General of Canada | Office of the Auditor General: https://www.oag-bvg.gc.ca/internet/English/parl_oag_202402_01_e_44428.html;

item.title: Should Christians Watch the Chosen? [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: This week P Nate and Pootie step into the studio to talk about whether or not Christians should watch the hit series about the life of Jesus: the Chosen.  Far from trying to engage in hot takes, the Rebels look at the issue pastorally, trying to fairly assess what many have enjoyed and seen fruit from, while offering a few (hopefully fair) criticism and highlighting a few concerns along the way.

item.title: Josh Howard of Eschatology Matters [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Josh Howard. Josh is a Pastor of Grace Community Church,  author of "Stories aBout The End Of Things", and host of the Eschatology Matters Podcast. We discussed the different views of end times theology, the differences, what the early church fathers believed, and how eschatology can effect your salvation and sanctification. Josh also stuck around for a "Fresh 10" segment towards the end of the show. Enjoy!

item.title: Ep. 81: Dr. Eithan Haim - A Whistleblower's Testimony [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Dr. Eithan Haim was in his residency at Texas Children’s Hospital when he discovered a lie that the hospital was covering up from the public. In March of 2022, Texas Children’s Hospital released a statement stating that due to many factors, they were terminating their gender transition department. While from the outside everything looked normal, Dr. Haim discovered a different reality happening within the walls of the hospital. Dr. Eithan Haim joins host Joseph Backholm to tell his whistleblower story of discovery, action, and the aftermath of his decision to shed light on the lies!

Resources

  • Legal Defense Fund for Surgeon Whistleblower
  • He Blew the Whistle. Now the Feds Are Punishing Him for It.

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. item.title: How Civilizations Collapse [The Pugcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Glenn talks about four causes of civilizational collapse: mass migration combined with corrupt and ineffectual government; sexual license; loss of belief in society and its values, and massive deficit spending. The guys talk about each of these, and, given that they are all are in place in America right now, discuss how we should be responding in our families and churches.

 

Support the Pugcast in Oxford on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-pugcast-goes-to-oxford/x/6893861#/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Ep. 80: The Battle for the Border - A Christian Perspective on Immigration [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Border security is national security. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by FRC's David Closson and The Washington Stand's Joshua Arnold for a discussion on how to think biblically about the current border and immigration crisis. They compare and contrast the different approaches seen in the last administration and the current one. David and Joshua both emphasize the need for a balanced approach that considers the welfare of both immigrants and citizens.

Resources

  • ⁠4 Biblical Principles to Inform Immigration Policy⁠
  • ⁠‘A Biden Invasion’: Trump and Biden’s Border Speeches Make ‘An Extraordinary Contrast’⁠

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. item.title: From WINNIPEG to WUHAN: How Trudeau's Canada is at the Heart of the Global Plandemic [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 14, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dive deep into two MASSIVE SCANDALS -Winnipeg Lab Leak & ArriveCan APP- both of which implicate the Trudeau Regime of massive corruption and incompetence, both of which they are trying to cover up. TUNE IN TO HEAR WHAT THE TRUDEAU-FUNDED MSM WON'T TELL YOU.

[Segment 1] - The Scientist - The Winnipeg Virologist Connected to Carona Virus Gain-of-Function and Lab Leak:
Lab Leak Story by Shiela Gunn Reid | Rebel News Online: https://twitter.com/RebelNewsOnline/status/1767346546763547100;
Winnipeg lab firing documents released | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/winnipeg-lab-firing-documents-released-china-1.7128865;

[Segment 2] - The Cover-up:
Trudeau govt virologists who transferred Ebola to Wuhan had clandestine relationship with Chinese | Zero Hedge: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/trudeau-govt-virologists-who-transferred-ebola-wuhan-had-clandestine-relationship-chinese;
Liberals, NDP shut down committee probing fired scientists | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/liberals-ndp-shut-down-committee-probing-fired-scientists?taid=65e6487672a63d00014ba003;
Liberals, NDP shut down investigation into Winnipeg lab | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/03/04/liberals-ndp-shut-investigation-winnipeg-lab2;

[Segment 3] - ArriveSCAM:
Auditor General of Canada | Office of the Auditor General: https://www.oag-bvg.gc.ca/internet/English/parl_oag_202402_01_e_44428.html;
Accountants afraid to speak | Blacklock's Reporter: https://www.blacklocks.ca/accountants-afraid-to-speak;
RCMP investigates Trudeau’s $60 million ArriveCAN boondoggle | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/rcmp-investigates-trudeaus-60-million-arrivecan-boondoggle?utm_content=;
Companies tied to ArriveCAN scandal banned from bidding on federal contracts | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/companies-tied-to-arrivecan-scandal-banned-from-bidding-on-federal-contracts-1.6796927;

item.title: Why Calvinism: Dr. Sam Waldron & In Studio Music By Kenny & Claire [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
Finishing out the third installment of the coverage from the Why Calvinism Conference, Greg sat down with Dr. Sam Waldron and Kenny and Claire.

Dr. Sam Waldron is a Pastor, Author, and President of the Covenant Baptist Theological Seminary. They discussed the importance of theology, his struggle with the Doctrine of Assurance, and why Calvinistic Theology is so important.

Kenny & Claire are international traveling musicians that arrange, write, and perform old and new hymns. They were kind enough to perform a song for Greg in studio. Be sure to support their fundraising efforts for their next album here. 

K&K Furnishings: Providing quality furnishings for business, education, worship, and hospitality for the Glory of God!

Jacob's Supply: Quality building materials at wholesale prices!

Facebook: Dead Men Walking Podcast
Youtube: Dead Men Walking Podcast
Instagram: @DeadMenWalkingPodcast
Twitter X: @RealDMWPodcast
Exclusive Content: PubTV App
